rooms.description: North-facing entrance with ample natural light and a welcoming foyer.
Spacious living room with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and scenic view. Bohemian decor elements like colorful textiles and vintage furniture.
Cozy dining area integrated with living space, featuring Bohemian elements and comfortable seating.
Modern kitchen with functional layout and ample storage. Includes a breakfast nook.
Additional utility space for washing and storage.

openings.description: North-facing entrance door designed for energy flow and welcoming ambience.
Floor-to-ceiling windows providing natural light and a connection with the outdoors.
Balcony attached to living room for additional outdoor space.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a balcony offering serene views and privacy. Bohemian decor elements include wall hangings and soft textiles.
Guest or child's bedroom with its own balcony ensuring privacy and natural light.
Cozy bedroom with a balcony. Bohemian accents are used to create a relaxed vibe.
Additional bedroom designed with a balcony for privacy and natural light.
Modern bathroom with functional design and Bohemian touches like unique fixtures.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window in master bedroom for unobstructed view and enhanced natural lighting.
Balcony opening attached to the master bedroom ensuring privacy and relaxation space.
